<template>
  <GChart type="PieChart"  :data="chartData" :options="chartOptions" style="width: 900px; height: 500px;" />
</template>
    
    <script>
import { GChart } from "vue-google-charts";

export default {
  name: "GoogleChart",
  components: {

  },
  data() {

</script>
